Html:
I would like to use XAML (vector) based visuals for the icons used in the ribbon.  These don't necessarily need to be interactive (they could be frozen).
This could be exposed on the RibbonComand as an additional feature ontop of the existin Small and LargeImageSource.  Maybe a property call ImageContent.
This would enable resolution independence and allow designers to compose visuals for icon images that included regional dependent symbols (currency symbols etc).
